thread.title: Couple living ice cream dream after taking over popular shop

author: By Chantal Lamers
title: Couple living ice cream dream after taking over popular shop
text:

Marianne’s Ice Cream is a Santa Cruz favorite.
Before Bi-Rite Creamery’s Salted Caramel and Humphry Slocombe’s Secret Breakfast, there was Sam Lieberman and his little red ice cream shop, Marianne’s. Marianne’s Ice Cream is a Santa Cruz favorite. Marianne’s Ice Cream is a Santa Cruz favorite.
Before Bi-Rite Creamery’s Salted Caramel and Humphry Slocombe’s Secret Breakfast, there was Sam Lieberman and his little red ice cream shop, Marianne’s.
